name: PuccaCooks
description: Tobe finally caught Garu, to free him demands that Pucca serve him a variety of soups. It's time that pucca put into practice what Dumpling, Linguini and Ho have taught her. Help pucca cook and serve these soups to rescue her platonic love. Press space to grab and drag objects and 'z' to chop ingredients. ¡Don't get any soup wrong or Tobe will get mad!.
